name: Kintsukuroi (Piers Bishop)
description:
Kintsukuroi is the japanese art of reparing broken pottery by mending it with gold, to display the object's history rather than try to hide it by fixing it back to its original state.

A spirit has hatched, but this ordeal put it in a bad state. Explore a beautiful and vibrant world, and feed on anything you can find to grow, and heal. 

Programming  and character graphics by Piers Bishop. Environment by Maëlys Jusseaux and Camille Couturier. Music by Chad Crouch on Free Music Archive.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020 : Repair. 

Controls :

  • Move : Arrow Keys or Left Joystick
  • Eat : Left Ctrl or one of the controller face buttons
